import React from "react"; import { Bar, Line, Chart, Doughnut } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { Chart as ChartJS } from "chart.js/auto"; import Transaction from "../Transaction"; import { Card, Button, Tooltip, OverlayTrigger } from "react-bootstrap"; import MoneyCard from "../Cards/MoneyCard"; import DoughnutCard from "../Cards/DoughnutCard"; import BarCard from "../Cards/BarCard"; const state = { labels: ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May"], datasets: [ { label: "Rainfall", backgroundColor: "rgba(75,192,192,1)", borderColor: "rgba(0,0,0,1)", borderWidth: 2, data: [65, 59, 80, 81, 56], }, ], }; const doughnutData = { labels: ["Red", "Blue", "Yellow"], datasets: [ { label: "My First Dataset", data: [300, 50, 100], backgroundColor: [ "rgb(255, 99, 132)", "rgb(54, 162, 235)", "rgb(255, 205, 86)", ], hoverOffset: 4, }, ], }; const Home = () => { let financialData = [ { spend: 245.0, date: "01-01-2022" }, { spend: 821.0, date: "03-01-2022" }, { spend: 447.0, date: "04-01-2022" }, ]; const renderTooltip = (props) => (
